passives.name: Aquamarine Waterglint Extension
passives.desc:
Aquamarine Waterglint use +1

When using Aquamarine Waterglint:
 â€¢ Becomes group attack; deals proportionate HP damage to each target
 â€¢ Becomes 2-hit  PG attack; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage

HP Attack becomes Dragon Wave (grants BRV to allies based on HP damage dealt) while Water Dragon active
